name: Compressor - 12AU7 Tube Pedal
details:
12AU7 Tube Compressor PedalThe COMPRESSOR is a boutique all-analog vacuum tube pedal designed to offer the most transparent compression available, combining great sustain and low noise operation. Its feed-forward side-chain and custom opto-resistive attenuation produces a soft knee, as opposed to hard limiting, providing a very natural presentation without pumping effects. This will be your always on pedal, and with tons of clean headroom, you can use it on vocals too.
Hand built in USA.
https://www.hagamps.com/collections/pedals/products/compressor
